channel.title: Cooking Burger on The Ulampinoy Project
channel.description: Recent content in Cooking Burger on The Ulampinoy Project

item.title: Burger Rey
item.description: Last night while watching No Reservations Techniques episode, I told myself that I should make my own burger patty. Earlier today I’ve made my first attempt: Grilling patty to char Not that bad I think. Here is the view from the back: Burger Rey, backview Though I enjoyed it very much, there are still things that can be done to improve it. I will post the recipe in the next attempt.
